name: Heartbreak (Deep Void)
description:
Heartbreak is a short horror game (for PC, Mac, and Linux) where you piece together your broken heart while collecting its shards (which are scattered throughout the map). All the while you are hunted by a deranged 'thing' that will drain your health and make awful dissonant noises when it's near enough to you. 

----------------------------------------

If you enjoy innovative games for Android, feel free to check out my page on Google Play. All of my games there are free with ads. I intend to upload more games here as well as I come up with new ideas for stuff.
